body:
Hey guys, I'm doing an AMA!

Question Limit: 10







jk ask as many as you want




have fun!

title: Jayster AMA!

replies.body:
{tag=93d2f61709da4354bc43d0817c00c347}

I think you're a pretty cool guy, and I think you have potential with your PvP aswell. I think that if you try to act more mature and really work hard with your PvP,  then you could join some pretty decent teams.

{tag=e8553404a26540f6ae9f2a08f295041a}

I think you're a pretty cool guy, and you are better at PvP than I am. I remember back when you weren't as good as you are now, and I was better than you lol. Seems like only yesterday.

You're definitely better at PvP than I am.

You're a cool moderator, and I think you're pretty decent at PvP too. You seem pretty chill and I think if you work hard to stand out from the moderator team then you might get promoted quite quickly.
